EmailTemplate.name: Help Desk Template HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Automated Email (Do Not Reply) - Help Desk Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.SuppliedName},
Thank you for your inquiry. You’ve reached us over the weekend and as a result response times may be slower. If you need help logging into your account, please navigate to the login page and click ‘Forgot Password’ – your username is likely to be your email address. We look forward to connecting with you soon.
Thank you, Green Street
Please do not reply to this email as inbound messages are not monitored by Green Street.
